description: Provides income support of ₹6,000 per year to all eligible farmer families across India, paid in three equal instalments.
eligibility_criteria: All landholding farmer families with cultivable land. Excludes institutional landholders, income tax payers, and certain professionals.
benefits: ₹6,000 per year transferred directly to the beneficiary's bank account.
application_process: Farmers can register through the local revenue office, agriculture department, or the PM-KISAN online portal.
required_documents: Aadhaar card, bank account details, land ownership proof.

description: Crop insurance scheme providing financial support to farmers in case of crop loss due to natural calamities, pests, or diseases.
eligibility_criteria: All farmers growing notified crops in notified areas, including loanee and non-loanee farmers.
benefits: Insurance coverage at a very low premium rate; balance premium shared by government.
application_process: Apply through the Common Service Centre (CSC), bank branch, or PMFBY online portal before the cut-off date for each crop season.
required_documents: Aadhaar card, land documents, bank account details, crop details.

description: A pension scheme for small and marginal farmers providing a minimum pension of ₹3,000 per month after the age of 60.
eligibility_criteria: Small and marginal farmers aged between 18 and 40 years with cultivable land up to 2 hectares.
benefits: Monthly pension of ₹3,000 post-retirement, with government co-contributing equal premium.
application_process: Enroll at CSC centers or through the official PM-KMY portal by paying the initial contribution.
required_documents: Aadhaar card, bank account details, age proof, land ownership proof.

scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Urja Suraksha Evam Utthaan Mahabhiyan (PM-KUSUM)
description: Promotes installation of solar pumps and grid-connected solar power plants by farmers.
eligibility_criteria: Individual farmers, cooperatives, and farmer producer organizations owning agricultural land or irrigation pumps.
benefits: Subsidy up to 60% for solar pump installation, income from selling surplus power to grid.
application_process: Apply through state renewable energy development agency or designated nodal agency.
required_documents: Land ownership proof, Aadhaar card, bank details, electricity/pump connection proof.

description: Provides soil health cards to farmers containing nutrient status of soil and fertilizer recommendations.
eligibility_criteria: All farmers in India can avail this facility through state agricultural departments.
benefits: Free soil testing and fertilizer usage recommendations for improved productivity.
application_process: Submit soil samples to the nearest testing lab or agriculture office for analysis.
required_documents: Land details, Aadhaar card, contact information.

description: Encourages organic farming through cluster-based development programs.
eligibility_criteria: Farmers willing to adopt organic practices and form clusters or groups.
benefits: Financial assistance per hectare for organic input, certification, and marketing support.
application_process: Apply through state agriculture departments or participating organic farming clusters.
required_documents: Farmer ID, Aadhaar card, land ownership documents.

description: Provides medium and long-term loans for post-harvest management infrastructure and community farming assets.
eligibility_criteria: Farmers, agri-entrepreneurs, cooperatives, and FPOs engaged in agriculture value chain.
benefits: Interest subvention and credit guarantee coverage for eligible loans.
application_process: Apply through participating banks or via the AIF online portal.
required_documents: Project proposal, bank details, land or business registration proof.

scheme_name: Formation and Promotion of 10,000 Farmer Producer Organizations (FPOs)
description: Supports formation and promotion of FPOs to enable collective farming and better market access.
eligibility_criteria: Groups of small and marginal farmers forming registered FPOs or cooperatives.
benefits: Financial assistance, equity grants, and credit guarantee support for three years.
application_process: Apply through designated implementing agencies like NABARD, SFAC, or NCDC.
required_documents: FPO registration certificate, member list, bank account details.

description: Promotes scientific beekeeping and honey production for increasing farmer income.
eligibility_criteria: Farmers, beekeepers, FPOs, and SHGs involved in honey production or processing.
benefits: Financial assistance for beekeeping equipment, training, and processing units.
application_process: Apply through state horticulture or agriculture departments.
required_documents: Identity proof, bank account details, land or site proof for apiary.

description: Provides interest subvention on short-term crop loans up to ₹3 lakh to farmers.
eligibility_criteria: Farmers availing short-term crop loans under Kisan Credit Card scheme.
benefits: Interest rate reduced to 7%, with an additional 3% subvention for timely repayment.
application_process: Apply for crop loan through any eligible bank under KCC.
required_documents: KCC documents, Aadhaar card, land and crop details.

description: Provides direct financial assistance to farmers for agricultural investments before each cropping season.
eligibility_criteria: Land-owning farmers in Telangana; tenant farmers are not covered.
benefits: ₹5,000 per acre per crop season deposited directly into the farmer’s account.
application_process: Registration through local agriculture department or online portal.
required_documents: Land ownership documents, Aadhaar card, bank details.

description: Procures cow dung from farmers and livestock owners to promote organic manure production and rural income.
eligibility_criteria: Farmers and cattle owners residing in Chhattisgarh.
benefits: Government buys cow dung at a fixed rate, generating additional income for farmers.
application_process: Register as a supplier at village-level centers or online portal.
required_documents: Identity proof, bank details, livestock ownership proof.

description: Provides timely credit to farmers for crop cultivation and other agricultural needs.
eligibility_criteria: All farmers involved in crop cultivation, allied activities, or animal husbandry.
benefits: Short-term credit at subsidized interest rates with flexible repayment options.
application_process: Apply through banks or cooperative societies offering KCC.
required_documents: Aadhaar card, land documents, bank details, photo ID.

description: Aims to improve irrigation efficiency and ensure water availability for all farms.
eligibility_criteria: All farmers, especially those in water-scarce regions.
benefits: Financial assistance for micro-irrigation systems like drip and sprinkler irrigation.
application_process: Apply through state agriculture or irrigation departments.
required_documents: Land ownership proof, Aadhaar card, bank account details.

description: Ensures adequate supply of neem-coated urea to reduce fertilizer misuse and improve soil health.
eligibility_criteria: All farmers purchasing urea for agricultural use.
benefits: Improved nitrogen efficiency, reduced pest attacks, and lower urea consumption.
application_process: Purchase neem-coated urea from authorized fertilizer dealers.
